channel.title: CVE Feed for Adam Retail Automation Systems -- Mobilmen Terminal Software
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adam Retail Automation Systems -- Mobilmen Terminal Software

item.title: CVE-2023-1508|2024-08-02T05:49:11.680Z -- adam%20retail%20automation%20systems -- mobilmen%20terminal%20software
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Adam Retail Automation Systems Mobilmen Terminal Software allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Mobilmen Terminal Software: before 3.
